content: {"locationId": "9387", "organizationId": "7653", "name": "Grace Fellowship Church, INC", "address1": "1120 Malcom Bridge Road", "address2": "", "city": " Bogart", "state": "GA", "zipCode": "30622", "country": null, "phone": "", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "33.874035", "longitude": "-83.5027717", "foodPrograms": "Pop-Up/Mobile Resource", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "English, Sign Language (ASL), Spanish", "features": "Restrooms Available", "aboutUs": "Grace Fellowship Church 's mission is helping people become fully devoted disciples of Christ who grow Together in Fellowship, Upward in Worship, Outward in Ministry, and Deeper in Truth. Our monthly mobile food distribution is one way that we serve outward in ministry.    Volunteers of all ages are welcome to come and help us as we serve. You do not have to attend Grace Fellowship Church to serve at the distribution.  Schedule: 2:45- devotion and prayer  3:00- unload and package food  4:00- mobile distribution  If you are coming to receive food, please do not start lining up until 2 pm. While you are waiting, our team will visit with you, pray with you, and ask how else we can serve you.   PLEASE NOTE: our parking lot us currently under construction. Follow direction signs for that month's distribution. ", "notes": "Drive Through Food Distributions monthly on the fourth Thursday of the month at 4 pm (Except November and December)  ** PLEASE NOTE: Due to construction on our campus, the summer distributions will take place down the road from us at Bethlehem Church Oconee Campus (1820 Ray's Church Rd.)***  Current Schedule:  July 24  August 28", "contactName": "Pastor Dave Ham", "contactPhone": "210-748-4316", "contactEmail": "dham@graceathens.com", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Curbside Pickup / Drive Through", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 63, "regionName": "Food Bank of Northeast Georgia", "logoBlobNameSmall": "105aa7a8-af28-4284-8de2-421eef4eca4d.png", "website": "https://foodbanknega.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Eastern Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "ET", "offsetHours": "-4", "schedules": ["Thursday 2:00 PM-5:30 PM (Mobile Food Pantry)"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
